title: Die Hard - Quadrilogy. Untouched Box Set.Nordic
description:
******************************************************************************
                       Die Hard (1988)
******************************************************************************

Languages............: English 5.1 DTS, English 5.1

Subtitles............: Danish, Norwegian, Swedish, Finnish and 
                       English for Hearing Impaired

Source...............: DVD-9, PAL, 16:9

Movie Information....: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0095016/

Tool.................: DVDFab Platinum 4.1.2.0


******************************************************************************
                       Die Hard 2 - Die Harder (1990)
******************************************************************************

Subtitles............: Danish, Norwegian, Swedish, Finnish and 
                       English for Hearing Impaired

Source...............: DVD-9, PAL, 16:9

******************************************************************************
                       Die Hard - With A Vengeance (1995)
******************************************************************************

******************************************************************************
                       Die Hard 4.0 - Live Free Or Die Hard (2007)
******************************************************************************

Languages............: English 5.1 DTS, English 5.1

Subtitles............: Danish, Norwegian, Swedish, Finnish and 
                       English for Hearing Impaired

Source...............: DVD-9, PAL, 16:9

Tool.................: DVDFab Platinum 4.1.2.0



------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Release Notes
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There were no extras in this box set so no need to ask for them !

I have left these movies untouched. If you want the DVD-9
on a DVD-5 you can shrink them yourself as you please. 
Just use a tool like DVDFab Platinum.

Enjoy! And do NOT forget to SEED ..... A ratio above 1 should be a minimum !!! 

Remember: Only by seeding is it possible to keep the torrents alive !!! 
The next guy wants the movies just as bad as you do !

So please keep SEEDING after you have finished downloading and more goodies
could be coming up soon !!!
